tit.cmt: 「信彰」の読みは用語集 “Nobukata” ではなくエクセル中の “Nobutaka” を記載しています。

sen.j: 松平 信彰（まつだいら のぶたか）は、丹波亀山藩の第4代藩主。
sen.e: Nobutaka MATSUDAIRA was the fourth lord of Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
Nobutaka MATSUDAIRA was the fourth lord of the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
Nobutaka MATSUDAIRA was the fourth lord of the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.

sen.j: 丹波亀山藩形原松平家9代。
sen.e: The ninth family head of the House of Katahara-Matsudaira in Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
The ninth family head of the Katahara-Matsudaira family in the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
sen.cmt: the House of Katahara-Matsudaira→the Katahara-Matsudaira familyに修正、the Kameyama Domainとしました。
sen.e: The ninth family head of the Katahara-Matsudaira family in the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.

sen.j: 天明2年（1782年）11月5日、第3代藩主・松平信道の長男として丹波亀山で生まれる。
sen.e: On December 9, 1782, born as the first son of Nobumichi MATSUDAIRA, the third lord.
On December 9, 1782, Nobutaka was born in Tanba Kameyama as the first son of Nobumichi MATSUDAIRA, the third lord.
sen.cmt: born→Nobutaka was bornとし、「丹波亀山で」→訳漏れのため訳出しました。
sen.e: On December 9, 1782, Nobutaka was born in Tanba Kameyama as the first son of Nobumichi MATSUDAIRA, the third lord.

sen.j: 寛政3年（1791年）、父の死去により家督を継いで第4代藩主となる。
sen.e: In 1791, succeeded to the position of family head at the time of his father's death to become the fourth lord.
In 1791, succeeded to the position of family head at the time of his father's death to become the fourth lord.
sen.cmt: 全角アポストロフィーを半角に修正
sen.e: In 1791, succeeded to the position of family head at the time of his father's death to become the fourth lord.

sen.j: 寛政8年（1796年）12月、従五位下・紀伊守に叙任される。
sen.e: In December 1796 or January 1797, conferred to Jugoinoge Kii no Kami (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade, Governor of Kii Province).
In December 1796, conferred to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), the Governor of Kii Province.
sen.cmt: 統一事項より、December 1796 or January 1797→December 1796に修正、「従五位下・紀伊守」の表記を修正
sen.e: In December 1796, conferred to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), the Governor of Kii Province.

sen.j: 享和2年（1802年）9月21日（9月18日、9月20日とも）に死去。
sen.e: Died on October 17 (also said October 14, and October 16), 1802.
Died on October 17 (also said October 14, and October 16), 1802.
Died on October 17 (also said October 14, and October 16), 1802.
Died at the age of 21.

Died at the age of 21.

sen.j: 後を養子の松平信志が継いだ。
sen.e: Succeeded by Nobuyuki MATSUDAIRA, his adopted son.
sen.cmt: 「信志」の読みは用語集 “Nobuzane” ではなくエクセル中の “Nobuyuki” を記載しています。
sen.e: Nobuyuki MATSUDAIRA, his adopted son, succeeded to his position.
